GE07bhg4c14u:2: paraṃ bhūyaḥ pravakṣyāmi jñānānāṃ jñānam uttamam /
GE07bhg4c14u:3: yaj jñātvā munayaḥ sarve parāṃ siddhim ito gatāḥ //1//
GE07bhg4c14u:10: sa ca kṣetra-kṣetrajñayoḥ saṃyogo nirīśvara-sāṅkhyānām iva na svātantryeṇa /
GE07bhg4c14u:11: kintu īśvarecchayiveti kathana-pūrvakaṃ kāraṇaṃ guṇa-saṅgo 'sya sad-asad-yoni-janmasu
GE07bhg4c14u:12: ity anenoktaṃ sattvādi-guṇīkṛtaṃ saṃsāra-vaicitryaṃ prapañcayiṣyan evambhūtaṃ vakṣyamānam
GE07bhg4c14u:13: arthaṃ stauti bhagavān paraṃ bhūya iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c14u:16: taj jñānaṃ bhūyo 'pi tubhyaṃ prakarṣeṇa vakṣyāmi /
GE07bhg4c14u:20: tad evāha yaj jñātvā munayo manana-śīlāḥ sarve /
GE07bhg4c14u:25: pūrvādhyāye - yāvat saṃjāyate kiṃcit sattvaṃ sthāvara-jaṅgamam /
GE07bhg4c14u:26: kṣetra-kṣetrajña-saṃyogāt tad viddhi [Gītā 13.26] ity uktaṃ tatra nirīśvara-sāṅkhyam atinirākaraṇena kṣetra-kṣetrajña-saṃyogasyeśvarādhīnatvaṃ vaktavyam /
GE07bhg4c14u:27: evaṃ kāraṇaṃ guṇa-saṅgo 'sya sad-asad-yoni-janmasu ity uktaṃ tatra kasmin guṇa kathaṃ saṅgaḥ ke vā guṇāḥ kathaṃ vā te badhnantīti vaktavyam
GE07bhg4c14u:28: tathā bhūta-prakṛti-mokṣaṃ ca ye vidur yānti te param ity uktaṃ tatra bhūta-prakṛti-śabditebhyo guṇebhyaḥ kathaṃ mokṣaṇaṃ syān muktasya ca kiṃ lakṣaṇam iti vaktavyaṃ,
GE07bhg4c14u:29: tad etat sarvaṃ vistareṇa vaktuṃ caturdaśo 'dhyāya ārabhyate /
GE07bhg4c14u:30: tatra vakṣyamāṇam arthaṃ dvābhyāṃ stuvan śrotṝṇāṃ rucy-utpattaye śrī-bhagavān uvāca param iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:34: jñānānāṃ jñāna-sādhanānāṃ bahiraṅgāṇāṃ yajñādīnāṃ madhya uttamam uttama-phalatvāt /
GE07bhg4c14u:37: uttamam ity anena tūtkṛṣṭa-phalatvam iti bhedaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:38: īdṛśaṃ jñānam ahaṃ pravakṣyāmi bhūyaḥ punaḥ pūrveṣv adhyāyeṣv asakṛd uktam api yaj
GE07bhg4c14u:39: jñānaṃ jñātvānuṣṭhāya munayo manana-śīlāḥ saṃnyāsinaḥ sarve parāṃ siddhiṃ mokṣākhyām
GE07bhg4c14u:42: guṇāḥ syur bandhakās te tu phalair jñeyāś caturdaśe /
GE07bhg4c14u:43: guṇātyaye ciha-tatir hetur bhaktiś ca varṇitā //
GE07bhg4c14u:44: pūrvādhyāye kāraṇaṃ guṇa-saṅgo 'sya sad-asad-yoni-janmasu ity uktam /
GE07bhg4c14u:47: kasya guṇasya saṅgāt kiṃ phalaṃ syāt,
GE07bhg4c14u:49: kathaṃ vā guṇebhyo mocanam ity apekṣāyāṃ vakṣyamānam arthaṃ stuvāno vaktuṃ pratijānīte param iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:50: jñāyate æneneti jñānam upadeśaḥ param atyuttamam //1//
GE07bhg4c14u:52: guṇāḥ syur bandhakās te tu pariceyāḥ phalais trayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:53: mad-bhaktyā tan-nivṛttiḥ syād iti proktaṃ caturdaśe //
GE07bhg4c14u:54: pūrvādhyāye mithaḥ-sampṛktānāṃ prakṛti-jīveśvarāṇāṃ svarūpāṇi vivicya jānann amānitvādi-dharmair viśiṣṭaḥB prakṛti-bandhād vimucyate bandha-hetuś ca guṇa-saṅga ity uktam /
GE07bhg4c14u:58: guṇa-saṅginaḥ kiṃvā lakṣaṇaṃ kathaṃ vā guṇebhyo muktiḥ ity apekṣāyāṃ vakṣyamāṇam artham ātma-rucy-utpattaye bhagavān stauti param iti dvābhyām
GE07bhg4c14u:59: paraṃ pūrvoktād anyaṃ prakṛti-jīvāntargatam eva guṇa-viṣayakaṃ jñānaṃ bhūyo vakṣyāmi yaj-jñānānāṃ prakṛti-jīva-viṣayakāṇām uttamaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ navanītavad uddhṛtatvāt /
GE07bhg4c14u:60: yaj jñātvopalabhya sarve munayas tan-manana-śīlā ito loke param ātma-yāthātmyopalabdhi-lakṣaṇāṃ siddhiṃ gatāḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:62: tac ca prāg uktam api bhūyaḥ punar vidhāntareṇa vakṣyāmi /
GE07bhg4c14u:63: tac ca jñānānāṃ tapaḥ-prabhṛtīnāṃ jñāna-sādhanānāṃ madhye param uttamam atyuttamaṃ tad-antaraṅga-sādhanatvāt /
GE07bhg4c14u:64: yaj jñātvā sarve munaya ito lokāt parāṃ mokṣa-lakṣaṇāṃ siddhiṃ gatāḥ //1//
GE07bhg4c14u:66: idaṃ jñānam upāśritya mama sādharmyam āgatāḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:67: sarge 'pi nopajāyante pralaye na vyathanti ca //2//
GE07bhg4c14u:69: idaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ jñānam upāśrityedaṃ jñāna-sādhanam anuṣṭhāya mama sādharmyaṃ mad-rūpatvaṃ prāptāḥ santaḥ sarge 'pi brahmādiṣu utpādyamāneṣv api notpadyante /
GE07bhg4c14u:74: tasyāḥ siddhair aikāntikatvaṃ darśayati idaṃ iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:75: idaṃ yathoktam jñānaṃ jñāna-sādhanam upāśrityānuṣṭhāya mama parameśvarasya sādharmyaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:76: mad-rūpatām atyantābhedenāgatāḥ prāptāḥ santaḥ sarge 'pi hiraṇyagarbhādiṣūtpadyamāneṣv api nopajāyante /
GE07bhg4c14u:77: pralaye brahmaṇo 'pi vināśa-kāle na vyathanti ca vyathante na ca līyanta ity arthaḥ //14.2//
GE07bhg4c14u:82: gurūpāsanayedaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ jñānam upāśritya prāpya janāḥ sarveśasya mama nityāvirbhūta-guṇāṣṭakasya
GE07bhg4c14u:83: sādharmyaṃ sādhanāvirbhāvitena tad-aṣṭakena sāmyam āgatāḥ santaḥ sarge nopajāyante
GE07bhg4c14u:84: sṛji-karmatāṃ nāpnuvanti pralaye na vyathante mṛti-karmatāṃ ca na yāntīti janma-mṛtyubhyāṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:85: rahitā muktā bhavantīti mokṣe jīva-bahutvam uktam /
GE07bhg4c14u:86: tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ ity ādi-śrutibhyaś caitad avagatam //2//
GE07bhg4c14u:88: mama yonir mahad brahma tasmin garbhaṃ dadhāmy aham /
GE07bhg4c14u:90: śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ praśaṃsayā śrotāram abhimukhīkṛtyedaṃ parameśvarādhīnayoḥ prakṛti-puruṣayoḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:91: sarva-bhūtotpattiṃ prati hetutvaṃ na tu svatantrayor itīmaṃ vivakṣitam arthaṃ kathayati mameti /
GE07bhg4c14u:95: tan mahad brahma mama parameśvarasya yonir garbhādhāna-sthānam /
GE07bhg4c14u:96: tasminn ahaṃ garbhaṃ jagad-vistāra-hetuṃ cid-ābhāsaṃ dadhāmi nikṣipāmi /
GE07bhg4c14u:97: pralaye mayi līnaṃ santam avidyā-kāma-karmānuśaya-vantaṃ kṣetrajñaṃ sṛṣṭi-samaye bhoga-yogyena kṣetreṇa saṃyojayāmīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:98: tato garbhādhānāt sarva-bhūtānāṃ brahmādīnāṃ sambhava utpattir bhavati //3//
GE07bhg4c14u:100: tad evaṃ praśaṃśayā śrotāram abhimukhīkṛtya parameśvarādhīnayoḥ prakṛti-puruṣayoḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:101: sarva-bhūtotpattiṃ prati hetutvaṃ na tu sāṅkhya-siddhāntavat svatantrayor itīmaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:102: vivakṣitam artham āha mama yonir iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c14u:105: avyākṛtaṃ prakṛtis triguṇātmkikā māyā mahad brahma /
GE07bhg4c14u:106: tac ca mameśvarasya yonir garbhādhāna-sthānaṃ tasmin mahati brahmaṇi yonau garbhaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:107: sarva-bhūta-janma-kāraṇam ahaṃ bahu syāṃ prajāyeya itīkṣaṇa-rūpaṃ saṃkalpaṃ dadhāmi
GE07bhg4c14u:110: kaścit pitā putram anuśayinaṃ vrīhy-ādy-āhāra-rūpeṇa svasmin līnaṃ śarīreṇa yojayituṃ yonau retaḥ-seka-pūrvakaṃ garbham ādhatte /
GE07bhg4c14u:111: tasmāc ca garbhādhānāt sa putraḥ śarīreṇa yujyate /
GE07bhg4c14u:112: tad arthaṃ ca madhye kalalādy-avasthā bhavanti /
GE07bhg4c14u:113: tathā pralaye mayi līnam avidiyā-kāma-karmānuśayavantaṃ kṣetrajñaṃ sṛṣṭi-samaye bhogyena kṣetreṇa kārya-kāraī̀ea-saṃghātena
GE07bhg4c14u:114: yojayituṃ cid-ābhāsaākhya-retaḥ-seka-pūrvakaṃ māyā-vṛtti-rūpaṃ garbham aham ādadhāmi /
GE07bhg4c14u:115: tad-arthaṃ hiraṇyagarbhādīnāṃ bhavati he bhārata na tv īśvara-kṛta-garbhādhānaṃ vinety arthaḥ //14.3//
GE07bhg4c14u:117: atha anādy-avidyā-kṛtasya guṇa-saṅgasya bandha-hetutā-prakāraṃ vaktuṃ kṣetra-kṣetrajñayoḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:118: sambhava-prakāram āha mama parameśvarasya yonir garbhādhāna-sthānaṃ mahad brahma
GE07bhg4c14u:120: bṛṃhaṇāt kārya-rūpeṇa vṛddher hetor brahma prakṛtir ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:121: śrutāv api kvacit prakṛtir brahmeti nirdiśyate /
GE07bhg4c14u:123: itas tv anyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi me parāṃ jīva-bhūtām ity anena cetana-puñja-rūpā yā jīva-prakṛtis taṭastha-śakti-rūpā nirdiṣṭā sā sakala-prāṇi-jīvatayā garbha-śabdenocyate /
GE07bhg4c14u:124: tato mat-kṛtāt garbhādhānāt sarva-bhūtānāṃ brahmādīnāṃ sambhava utpattiḥ //3//
GE07bhg4c14u:125: baladevaḥ : tad evaṃ vaktavyārtha-stutyā tasmin ruciṃ śrotur utpādya bhūmir āpaḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:126: ity ādi-dvayārthānusārāt yāvat sañjāyate kiñcit ity ādau prakṛti-jīva-saṃyogaṃ pareśa-hetukam
GE07bhg4c14u:128: mahat sarvasya prapañcasya kāraṇaṃ brahmābhivyakta-sattvādi-guṇakaṃ pradhānaṃ mama sarveśvarsyāṇḍa-koṭi-sraṣṭur yonir garbha-dhāraṇa-sthānaṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c14u:129: pradhāne brahma-śabdaś ca tasmād etad brahma nāma-rūpam annaṃ ca jāyate /
GE07bhg4c14u:131: tasmin mahati brahmaṇi yoni-bhūte garbhaṃ paramāṇu-caitanya-rāśim ahaṃ dadhāmy arpayāmi bhūmir āpaḥ ity ādinā yā jaḍā prakṛtir uktā /
GE07bhg4c14u:133: itas tv anyām ity ādinā yā cetanā prakṛtir uktā seha sarva-prāṇi-bījatvād garbha-śabdeneti bhoga-kṣetra-bhūtayā jaḍayā prakṛtyā saha cetana-bhoktṛ-vargaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:135: tato mahad-dhetukāt prakṛti-dvaya-saṃyogād garbhādhānād vā sarva-bhūtānāṃ brahmādi-stambāntānāṃ sambhavo janir bhavati //3//
GE07bhg4c14u:138: tāsāṃ brahma mahad yonir ahaṃ bīja-pradaḥ pitā //4//
GE07bhg4c14u:139: śrīdharaḥ : na kevalaṃ sṛṣṭy-upakrama eva mad-adhiṣṭhānenābhyāṃ prakṛti-puruṣābhyām ayaṃ bhūtotpatti-prakāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:141: sarvāsu yoniṣu manuṣyādyāsu yā mūrtayaḥ sthāvara-jaṅgamātmikā utpadyante tāsāṃ mūrtīnāṃ mahad brahma prakṛtir yonir mātṛ-sthānīyā /
GE07bhg4c14u:142: ahaṃ ca bīja-pradaḥ pitā garbhādhāna-kartā pitā //4//
GE07bhg4c14u:144: nanu kathaṃ sarva-bhūtānāṃ tataḥ sambhavo devādi-deha-viśeṣāṇāṃ kāraṇāntara-sambhavād ity āśaṅkyāha sarva-yoniṣv iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:145: deva-pitṛ-manuṣya-paśu-mṛgādi-sarva-yoniṣu yā mūrtayo jarāyujāṇḍodbhijjādi-bhedena vilakṣaṇā vividha-saṃsthānās tanavaḥ saṃbhavanti he kaunteya/
GE07bhg4c14u:146: tāsāṃ mūrtīnāṃ tat-tat-kāraṇa-bhāvāpannaṃ mahad brahmaiva yonir mātṛ-sthānīyā /
GE07bhg4c14u:147: ahaṃ parameśvaro bīja-prado garbhādhānasya kartā pitā /
GE07bhg4c14u:148: tena mahato brahmaṇa evāvasthā-viśeṣāḥ kāraṇāntarāṇīti yuktam uktaṃ sambhavaḥ sarva-bhūtānāṃ tato bhavati [Gītā 14.3] iti //4//
GE07bhg4c14u:150: na kevalaṃ sṛṣṭy-utpatti-samaya eva sarva-bhūtānāṃ prakṛtir mātā ahaṃ pitā api tu
GE07bhg4c14u:151: sarvadaivety āha sarvāsu yoniṣu devādyāsu stamba-paryantāsu yā mūrtayo jaṅgama-sthāvarātmikā
GE07bhg4c14u:152: utpadyante tāsāṃ mūrtīnāṃ mahad brahma prakṛtiḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:156: he kaunteya sarva-yoniṣu devādi-sthāvarāntāsu yoniṣu yā mūrtayas tanavaḥ sambhavanti tāsāṃ mahad brahma pradhānaṃ yonir utpatti-hetur mātety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:157: jīva-pradas tat-karmānuguṇyena paramāṇu-caitanya-rāśi-saṃyojakaḥ pareśo 'haṃ pitā bhavāmi //4//
GE07bhg4c14u:159: sattvaṃ rajas tama iti guṇāḥ prakṛti-saṃbhavāḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:161: śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ parameśvarādhīnābhyāṃ prakṛti-puruṣābhyāṃ sarva-bhūtotpattiṃ nirūpyedānīṃ prakṛti-saṃyogena puruṣasya saṃsāraṃ prapañcayati
GE07bhg4c14u:163: sattvaṃ rajas tama ity evaṃ saṃjñakās trayo guṇāḥ prakṛti-sambhavāḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:164: prakṛteḥ sambhava udbhavo yeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:166: tasyāḥ sakāśāt pṛthaktveābhivyaktāḥ santaḥ prakṛti-kārye dehe tādātmyena sthitaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:167: dehinaṃ cid-aṃśaṃ vastuto 'vyayaṃ nirvikāram eva santaṃ nibadhnanti sva-kāryaiḥ sukha-duḥkha-mohādibhiḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:174: ity ucyate sattvam ity ādinānyam ity ataḥ prāk caturdaśabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:175: sattvaṃ rajas tama ity evaṃ-nāmāno guṇā nitya-paratantrāḥ puruṣaṃ prati sarveṣām acetanānāṃ cetanārthatvāt /
GE07bhg4c14u:177: na ca guṇa-guṇinor anyatvam atra vivakṣitam guṇa-trayātmakatvāt prakṛteḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:179: ity ucyate - trayāṇāṃ guṇānāṃ sāmyāvasthā prakṛtir māyā bhagavats tasyāḥ sakāśāt parasparāṅgāṅgi-bhāvena vaiṣamyeṇa pariṇatāḥ prakṛti-sambhavā ity ucyante /
GE07bhg4c14u:180: te ca dehe prakṛti-kārye śarīrendriya-saṃghāte dehinaṃ deha-tādātmyādhyāsāpannaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:181: jīvaṃ paramārthataḥ sarva-vikāra-śūnyatvenāvyayaṃ nibadhnanti nirvikāram eva santaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:182: sva-vikāravattayopadarśayantīva bhrāntyā jala-pātrāṇīva divi sthitam ādityaṃ pratibimbādhyāsena
GE07bhg4c14u:184: yathā ca pāramarthiko bandho nāsti tathā vyākhyātaṃ prāk - śarīrastho 'pi kaunteya na karoti na lipyate [Gītā 13.32] iti //5//
GE07bhg4c14u:186: tad eva prakṛti-puruṣābhyāṃ sarva-bhūtotpattiṃ nirūpeydānīṃ ke guṇā ucyante /
GE07bhg4c14u:187: teṣu saṅgāt jīvasya kīdṛśo bandha ity apekṣāyām āha sattvam iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:188: dehe prakṛti-kārye tādātmyena sthitaṃ dehinaṃ jīvaṃ vastuto 'vyayaṃ nirvikāram asaṅginam apy anādy-avidyayā kṛtād guṇa-saṅgād eva hetor guṇā nibadhnanti //5//
GE07bhg4c14u:189: baladevaḥ : atha ke guṇāḥ kathaṃ teṣu puruṣasya saṅgaḥ kathaṃ vā te taṃ nibadhnanti ity āha sattvam iti caturbhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:190: sattvādi-saṃjñakās trayo guṇāḥ prakṛti-sambhavāḥ prakṛter abhivyaktās te sva-kārye
GE07bhg4c14u:191: dehe sthitaṃ puruṣam avyayaṃ vastuto nirvikāram api nibadhnanty aviveka-gṛhītaiḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:196: śrīdharaḥ : tatra sattvasya bandhakatva-prakāraṃ cāha tatreti /
GE07bhg4c14u:197: tatra teṣāṃ guṇānāṃ madhye sattvaṃ nirmalatvāt svacchatvāt sphaṭika-maṇir iva prakāśakaṃ bhāsvaram anāmayaṃ ca nirupadravam /
GE07bhg4c14u:199: ataḥ śāntatvāt sva-kāryeṇa sukhena yaḥ saṅgas tena badhnāti /
GE07bhg4c14u:200: prakāśakatvāc ca svakāryeṇa jñānena yaḥ saṅgas tena ca badhnāti /
GE07bhg4c14u:202: ahaṃ sukhī jñānī ceti manodharmāṃs tad-abhimānini kṣetrajñe saṃyojayatīty arthaḥ //6//
GE07bhg4c14u:204: tatra ko guṇaḥ kena saṅgena badhnāti ?
GE07bhg4c14u:206: tatra teṣu guṇeṣu madhye sattvaṃ prakāśakam caitanyasya tamo-guṇa-kṛtāvaraṇa-tirodhāyakaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:209: āmayo duḥkhaṃ tad-virodhi sukhasyāpi vyañjakam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:212: sarvatra sambodhanānām abhiprāyaḥ prāg uktaḥ smartavyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:214: icchā dveṣaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃghātaś cetanā dhṛtiḥ [Gītā 13.7] iti sukha-cetanayor apīcchādivat kṣetra-dharmatvena pāṭhāt /
GE07bhg4c14u:215: tatrāntaḥ-karaṇa-dharmasya sukhasya jñānasya cātmany adhyāsaḥ saṅgo 'haṃ jāna iti ca /
GE07bhg4c14u:217: tasmād avidyā-mātram etad iti śataśa uktaṃ prāk //6//
GE07bhg4c14u:219: tatra sattvasya lakṣaṇaṃ bandhakatva-prakāraṃ cāha tatreti /
GE07bhg4c14u:221: śāntatvāt svakāryeṇa sukhena yaḥ saṅgaḥ prakāśakatvāt svakāryeṇa jñānena ca yaḥ saṅgaḥ ahaṃ sukhī jñānī cety upādhi-dharmayor avidyayaiva jīvasyābhimānas tena taṃ badhnāti /
GE07bhg4c14u:222: he anagheti tvaṃ tu ahaṃ sukhī ahaṃ jñānīty abhimāna-lakṣaṇam aghaṃ mā svīkur iti bhāvaḥ //6//
GE07bhg4c14u:223: baladevaḥ : atha sattvādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ lakṣaṇāni bandhakatva-prakārāṃś cāha tatreti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:224: tatra teṣu triṣu madhye prakāśakaṃ jñāna-vyañjakam anāmayam arogaṃ duḥkha-virodhi-sukha-vyañjakam iti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c14u:228: tac ca sattvaṃ sva-kārye jñāne sukhe ca yaḥ saṃyogo jñāny ahaṃ sukhy aham ity abhimānas tena puruṣaṃ nibadhnāti /
GE07bhg4c14u:229: jñānaṃ cedaṃ laukika-vastu -yāthātmya-viṣayaṃ sukhaṃ ca dehendriya-prasada-rūpaṃ bodhyam /
GE07bhg4c14u:230: tatra tatra saṅge sati tad-upāyeṣu karmasu pravṛttis tat-phalānubhavopāyeṣu deheṣūtpattiḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:231: punaś ca tatra tatra saṅga iti na sattvād vimuktiḥ //6//
GE07bhg4c14u:235: śrīdharaḥ : rajaso lakṣaṇaṃ bandhakatvaṃ cāha raja iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:240: tayos tṛṣṇāsaṅgayoḥ samudbhavo yasmāt tad-rajo dehinaṃ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārtheṣu karmasu saṅgenāsaktyā nitarāṃ badhnāti /
GE07bhg4c14u:241: tṛṣṇāsaṅgābhyāṃ hi karmasu āsaktir bhavatīty arthaḥ //7//
GE07bhg4c14u:243: rajyate viṣayeṣu puruṣo 'neneti rāgaḥ kāmo gardhaḥ sa evātmā svarūpaṃ yasya dharma-dharmitṇos tādātmyāt tad rāgātmakaṃ rajo viddhi /
GE07bhg4c14u:245: prāptasyopasthite 'pi vināśe saṃrakṣaṇābhilāṣa āsaṅgas tayos tṛṣṇāsaṅgayoḥ sambhavo yasmāt tad rajo nibadhnāti /
GE07bhg4c14u:247: karma-saṅgena karmasu dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārtheṣu aham ikdaṃ karomy etat phalaṃ bhokṣya ity
GE07bhg4c14u:248: abhiniveśa-viśeṣeṇa dehinaṃ vastuto 'kartāram eva kartṛtvābhimāninaṃ rajasaḥ pravṛtti-hetutvāt //7 //
GE07bhg4c14u:253: tayoḥ samudbhavo yasmāt tad rajaḥ dehinaṃ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārtheṣu karmasu saṅgenāsaktyā badhnāti tṛṣṇā-saṅgābhyāṃ karmasv āsaktir bhavati //7//
GE07bhg4c14u:254: baladevaḥ : raja iti rāgaḥ strī-puruṣayor mitho 'bhilāsas tad-ātmakaṃ rajo-vṛddhi-hetu-kāryayos tādātmyāt /
GE07bhg4c14u:256: putra-mitrādi-saṃyogo 'bhilāṣaḥ saṅgas tayoḥ sambhavo yasmāt tat /
GE07bhg4c14u:258: tad rajaḥ strī-viṣaya-putrādi-prāpakeṣu karmasu saṅgenābhilāṣeṇa dehinaṃ puruṣaṃ nibadhnāti /
GE07bhg4c14u:261: punar apy evam iti rajaso na vimuktiḥ //7//
GE07bhg4c14u:263: tamas tv ajñāna-jaṃ viddhi mohanaṃ sarva-dehinām /
GE07bhg4c14u:265: śrīdharaḥ : tamaso lakṣaṇaṃ bandhakatvaṃ cāha tama iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:266: tamas tv ajñānāj jātam āvaraṇa-śakti-pradhānāt prakṛty-aṃśād udbhutaṃ viddhīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:268: ataeva pramādenālasyena nidrayā ca tat tamo dehinaṃ nibadhnāti /
GE07bhg4c14u:274: ajñānād āvaraṇa-śakti-rūpād udbhūtam ajñāna-jaṃ tamo viddhi /
GE07bhg4c14u:275: ataḥ sarveṣāṃ dehināṃ mohanam aviveka-rūpatvena bhrānti-janakam /
GE07bhg4c14u:276: pramādenālasyena nidrayā ca tat tamo nibadhnāti /
GE07bhg4c14u:283: ajñānam ajñānāt svīya-phalāt jātaṃ pratītam anumitaṃ bhavatīty ajñānajam ajñāna-janakam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:291: tasmāj jātaṃ tamo ætaḥ sarva-dehināṃ mohanaṃ viparyaya-jñāna-janakam /
GE07bhg4c14u:292: tathā ca vastu-yāthātmya-jñānāvarakaṃ viparyaya-jñāna-janakaṃ tamaḥ iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:293: tat tamaḥ pramādādibhiḥ svakāryaiḥ puruṣaṃ nibadhnāti /
GE07bhg4c14u:294: tatra pramādo 'navadhānam akārye karmaṇi pravṛtti-rūpaṃ sattva-kārya-prakāśa-virodhī /
GE07bhg4c14u:299: sattvaṃ sukhe saṃjayati rajaḥ karmaṇi bhārata /
GE07bhg4c14u:300: jñānam āvṛtya tu tamaḥ pramāde saṃjayaty uta //9//
GE07bhg4c14u:301: śrīdharaḥ : sattvādīnām evaṃ sva-sva-kārya-karaṇe sāmarthyātiśayam āha sattvam iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:303: duḥkha-śokādi-kāraṇe sabhāpi sukhābhimukham eva dehinaṃ karotiīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:304: evaṃ sukhādi-kāraṇe saty api rajaḥ karmaṇy eva sañjayati /
GE07bhg4c14u:305: tamas tu mahat-saṅgena utpādyamānam api jñānam āvṛtyaācchādya pramāde sañjayati /
GE07bhg4c14u:311: sattvaṃ kartṛ sukhe svīya-phale āsaktaṃ jīvaṃ sañjayati vaśīkaroti nibadhnātīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:312: rajaḥ kartṛ karmāṇi āsaktaṃ jīvaṃ badhnāti /
GE07bhg4c14u:313: tamaḥ kartṛ pramāde 'bhirataṃ taṃ jñānam āvṛtya ajñānam utpādyety arthaḥ //9//
GE07bhg4c14u:314: baladevaḥ : guṇāḥ svāny advayotkṛṣṭāḥ santaḥ svakārye tanvantīty āha sattvam iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c14u:315: sattvam utkṛṣṭaṃ sat sva-kārye sukhe puruṣaṃ sañjayaty āsaktaṃ karoti /
GE07bhg4c14u:316: rajo utkṛṣṭaṃ sat karmāṇi taṃ sañjayati /
GE07bhg4c14u:317: tama utkṛṣṭaṃ sat pramāde taṃ sañjayati jñānam āvṛtyācchādyājñānam utpādyety arthaḥ //9//
GE07bhg4c14u:319: rajas tamaś cābhibhūya sattvaṃ bhavati bhārata /
GE07bhg4c14u:320: rajaḥ sattvaṃ tamaś caiva tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajas tathā //10//
GE07bhg4c14u:321: śrīdharaḥ : tatra hetum āha raja iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:322: rajas-tamaś ceti guṇa-dvayam abhibhūya tiraskṛtya sattvaṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c14u:325: evaṃ rajo 'pi sattvaṃ tamaś ceti guṇa-dvayam abhibhūyodbhavati /
GE07bhg4c14u:327: evaṃ tamo 'pi sattvaṃ rajaś cobhāv api guṇāv abhibhūyodbhavati /
GE07bhg4c14u:328: tataś ca sva-kārye pramādālasyādau sañjayatīty arthaḥ //10//
GE07bhg4c14u:332: rajas tamaś ca yugapad ubhāv api guṇāv abhibhūya sattvaṃ bhavati udbhavati vardhate yadā,
GE07bhg4c14u:333: tadā sva-kāryaṃ prāg-uktam asādhāraṇyena karotīti śeṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:334: evaṃ rajo 'pi sattvaṃ tamaś ceti guṇa-dvayam abhibhūyodbhavati yadā,
GE07bhg4c14u:336: tathā tadvad eva tamo 'pi sattvaṃ rajaś cety ubhāv api guṇāv abhibhūyodbhavati yadā,
GE07bhg4c14u:339: uktaṃ sva-sva-kāryaṃ sukhādikaṃ prati guṇāḥ kathaṃ prabhavantīty apekṣāyām āha rajas tamaś ceti guṇa-dvayam abhibhūya tiraskṛtya sattvaṃ bhavati adṛṣṭa-vaśād udbhavati /
GE07bhg4c14u:340: evaṃ rajo 'pi sattvaṃ tamaś ceti guṇa-dvayābhibhūya tādṛśādṛṣṭa-vaśād udbhavati /
GE07bhg4c14u:341: tamo 'pi sattvaṃ rajaś cobhāv api guṇāv abhibhūyodbhavati //10//
GE07bhg4c14u:342: baladevaḥ : sameṣu triṣu katham akasmād ekasyotkarṣa iti cet prācīna-tādṛśa-karmodayāt tādṛśāhārāc ca svabhavatīti bhavavān āha raja iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:343: sattvaṃ kartṛ rajas tamaś cābhibhūyo tiraskṛtyotkṛṣṭaṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c14u:344: rajaḥ kartṛ sattvaṃ tamaś cābhibhūyotkṛṣṭaṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c14u:345: tamaḥ kartṛ sattvaṃ rajaś cābhibhūyotkṛṣṭaṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c14u:347: tadā pūrvoktam asādhāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ karotīti śeṣaḥ //10//
GE07bhg4c14u:350: jñānaṃ yadā tadā vidyād vivṛddhaṃ sattvam ity uta //11//
GE07bhg4c14u:351: śrīdharaḥ : idānīṃ sattvādīnāṃ vivṛddhānāṃ liṅgāny āha sarva-dvāreṣv iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:352: asminn ātmano bhogāyatane dehe sarveṣv api dvāreṣu śrotrādiṣu yadā śabdādi-jñānātmakaḥ prakāśa upajāyate utpadyate tadānena prakāśaliṅgena sattvaṃ vivṛddhaṃ vidyāj jānīyāt /
GE07bhg4c14u:353: uta śabdāt sukhādi-liṅgenāpi jānīyād ity uktam //11//
GE07bhg4c14u:355: idānīm udbhūtānāṃ teṣāṃ liṅgāny āha tribhiḥ sarva-dvāreṣv iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:356: asminn ātmano bhogāyatane dehe sarveṣv api dvāreṣūpalabdhi-sādhaneṣu śrotrādi-karaṇeṣu yadā prakāśo buddhi-pariṇāma-viśeṣo viṣayākāraḥ sva-viṣayāvaraṇa-virodhī
GE07bhg4c14u:357: tad eva jñānaṃ śabdādi-viṣaya upajāyate tadānena śabdādi-viṣaya-jñānākhya-prakāśena liṅgena prakāśātmakaṃ sattvaṃ vivṛddham udbhūtam iti vidyāj jānīyāt /
GE07bhg4c14u:360: vardhamāno guṇa eva svāpekṣayā kṣīṇāv itarau guṇāv abhivaatīty uktam /
GE07bhg4c14u:361: atas teṣāṃ vṛddhi-liṅgāny āha sarveti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:364: jñānaṃ vaidika-śabdādi-yathārtha-jñānātmakaṃ tadā tādṛśa-jñāna-liṅgenaiva sattvaṃ vivṛddham iti jānīyāt /
GE07bhg4c14u:366: baladevaḥ : utkṛṣṭānāṃ sattvādīnāṃ liṅgāny āha sarveti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:367: yadā sarveṣu jñāna-dvāreṣu śrotrādiṣu śabdādi-yāthātmya-prakāśa-rūpṃ jñānam upajāyate /
GE07bhg4c14u:368: tadā tādṛśa-jñāna-liṅgenāsmin dehe sattvaṃ vivṛddhaṃ vidyāt /
GE07bhg4c14u:372: lobhaḥ pravṛttir ārambhaḥ karmaṇām aśamaḥ spṛhā /
GE07bhg4c14u:375: lobho dhanādy-āgame jāyamāne 'pi punaḥ punar vardhamāno 'bhilāṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:378: aśama idaṃ kṛtvā idaṃ kariṣyāmi ity ādi saṅkalpa-vikalpānuparamaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:379: spṛhā uccāvaceṣu dṛṣṭa-mātreṣu vastuṣu itas tato jighṛkṣā /
GE07bhg4c14u:380: rajasi vivṛddhe saty etāni liṅgāni jāyante /
GE07bhg4c14u:381: etais tamaso vivṛddhir jāānīyād ity arthaḥ //12//
GE07bhg4c14u:383: mahati dhanāgame jāyamāne 'py anukṣaṇaṃ vardhamānas tad-abhilāṣo lobhaḥ sva-viṣaya-prāpsya-nivartya icchā-viśeṣa iti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c14u:387: spṛhoccāvaceṣu para-dhaneṣu dṛṣṭa-mātreṣu yena kenāpy upāyenopāditsā /
GE07bhg4c14u:388: rajasi rāgātmake vivṛddha etāni rāgātmakāni liṅgāni jāyante /
GE07bhg4c14u:390: etair liṅgair vivṛddhaṃ rajo jānīyād ity arthaḥ //12//
GE07bhg4c14u:392: pravṛttir nānā prayatna-paratā karmaṇām ārambho gṛhādi-nirmāṇodyamaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:401: aprakāśo 'pravṛttiś ca pramādo moha eva ca /
GE07bhg4c14u:408: tamasi vivṛddhe saty etāni liṅgāni jāyante /
GE07bhg4c14u:409: etais tamaso vivṛddhiṃ jānīyād ity arthaḥ //13//
GE07bhg4c14u:411: aprakāśaḥ saty apy upadeśādau bodha-kāraṇe sarvathā bodhāyogyatvam /
GE07bhg4c14u:412: apravṛttiś ca saty apy agnihotraṃ juhuyād ity ādau pravṛtti-kāraṇaṃ janita-bodhe 'pi śāstre sarvathā tat-pravṛtty-ayogyatvam /
GE07bhg4c14u:414: moha eva ca moho nidrā viparyayo vā /
GE07bhg4c14u:417: tamasy eva vivṛddha etāni liṅgāni jāyante he kuru-nandana /
GE07bhg4c14u:418: ata etair liṅgair avayabhicāribhir vivṛddhaṃ tamo jānīyād ity arthaḥ //13//
GE07bhg4c14u:427: pramādaḥ karādisthe 'py arthe nāstīti pratyayo moho mithyābhiniveśaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:430: yadā sattve pravṛddhe tu pralayaṃ yāti deha-bhṛt /
GE07bhg4c14u:432: śrīdharaḥ : maraṇa-samaya eva vivṛddhānāṃ sattvādīnāṃ phala-viśeṣam āha yadeti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c14u:433: sattva pravṛddhe sati yadā jīvo mṛtyuṃ prāpnoti tadā uttamān hiraṇyagarbhādīn vidanti
GE07bhg4c14u:434: upāsata ity uttama-vidaḥ teṣāṃ ye amalāḥ prakāśamayā lokāḥ sukhopabhoga-sthāna-viśeṣās
GE07bhg4c14u:437: idānīṃ maraṇa-samaye vivṛddhānāṃ sattvādīnāṃ phala-viśeṣam āha yadeti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c14u:438: sattve pravṛddhe sati yadā pralayaṃ mṛtyuṃ yāti prāpnoti deha-bhṛd dehābhimānī jīvaḥ,
GE07bhg4c14u:439: tadottamā ye hiraṇyagarbhādayas tad-vidāṃ tad-upāsakānāṃ lokān deva-sukhopabhoga-sthāna-viśeṣān amalān rajas-tamo-mala-rahitān pratipadyate prāpnoti //14//
GE07bhg4c14u:442: tadā uttamaṃ vindanti labhanta ity uttama-vido hiraṇya-garbhādy-upāsakās teṣāṃ lokān amalān sukha-pradān //14//
GE07bhg4c14u:443: baladevaḥ : mṛti-kāle vivṛddhānāṃ guṇānāṃ phala-viśeṣān āha yad eti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c14u:444: sattve pravṛddhe sati yadā deha-bhṛj jīvaḥ pralayaṃ yāti mriyate,
GE07bhg4c14u:445: tadottama-vidāṃ hiraṇya-garbhādy-upāsakānāṃ lokān divya-bhogopetān pratipadyate labhate /
GE07bhg4c14u:451: rajasi pravṛddhe sati mṛtyuṃ prāpya karmāsakteṣu manuṣyeṣu jāyate /
GE07bhg4c14u:452: tathā tamasi pravṛddhe sati pralīno mṛto mūḍha-yoniṣu jāyate //15//
GE07bhg4c14u:454: rajasi pravṛddhe sati pralayaṃ mṛtyuṃ gatvā prāpya karma-saṅgiṣu śruti-smṛti-vihita-pratiṣiddha-karma-phalādhikāriṣu manuṣyeṣu jāyate /
GE07bhg4c14u:455: tathā tadvad eva tamasi pravṛddhe pralīno mṛto mūḍha-yoniṣu paśv-ādiṣu jāyate //15//
GE07bhg4c14u:458: baladevaḥ : rajasi pravṛddhe pralayṃ maraṇaṃ gatvā janaḥ karma-saṅgiṣu kāmya-karmāsakteṣu nṛṣu madhye jāyate /
GE07bhg4c14u:459: tathā tamasi pravṛddhe pralīno mṛto jano mūḍha-yoniṣu paśv-ādiṣu //15//
GE07bhg4c14u:462: rajasas tu phalaṃ duḥkham ajñānaṃ tamasaḥ phalam //16//
GE07bhg4c14u:463: śrīdharaḥ : idānīṃ sattvādīnāṃ svānurūpa karma-dvāreṇa vicitra-phala-hetutvam āha karmaṇa iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:464: sukṛtasya sāttvikasya karmaṇaḥ sāttvikaṃ sattva-pradhānaṃ nirmalaṃ prakāśa-bahulaṃ sukhaṃ phalam āhuḥ kapilādayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:465: rajasa iti rājasasya karmaṇa ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:468: tamasa iti tāmasasya karmaṇa ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:470: sāttvikādi-karma-lakṣaṇaṃ ca niyataṃ saṅga-rahitam ity ādinā aṣṭādaśe 'dhyāye vakṣyati //16//
GE07bhg4c14u:472: idānīṃ svānurūpa-karma-dvārā sattvādīnāṃ vicitra-phalatāṃ saṃkṣipyāha karmaṇa iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:473: sukṛtasya sāttvikasya karmaṇo dharmasya sāttvikaṃ sattvena nirvṛttaṃ nirmalaṃ rajas-tamo-malāmiśritaṃ sukhaṃ phalam āhuḥ paramarṣayau /
GE07bhg4c14u:474: rajaso rājasasya tu karmaṇaḥ pāpa-miśrasya puṇyasya phalaṃ rājasaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkha-bahulam alpaṃ sukhaṃ kāraṇānurūpyāt kāryasya /
GE07bhg4c14u:475: ajñānam aviveka-prāyaṃ duḥkhaṃ tāmasaṃ tamasas tāmasasya karmaṇo 'dharmasya phalam /
GE07bhg4c14u:477: sāttvikādi-karma-lakṣaṇaṃ ca niyataṃ saṅga-rahitam ity ādināṣṭādaśe vakṣyati /
GE07bhg4c14u:478: atra rajas-tamaḥ-śabdau tat-kārye prayuktau kārya-kāraṇayor abhedopacārāt gobhiḥ śrīṇīta matsaram ity atra yathā go-śabdas tat-prabhave payasi,
GE07bhg4c14u:479: yathā vā dhānyam asi dhinuhi devān ity atra dhānya-śabdas
GE07bhg4c14u:481: tatra payas taṇḍulayor ivātrāpi karmaṇaḥ prakṛtatvāt //16//
GE07bhg4c14u:483: sukṛtasya sāttvikasya karmaṇaḥ sāttvikam eva nirmalaṃ nirupadravam /
GE07bhg4c14u:485: baladevaḥ : atha guṇānāṃ svānurūpakarmadvārā vicitra-phala-hjetutvam āha karmaṇa iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:486: sukṛtasya sāttvikasya karmaṇo nirmalaṃ phalam āhur guṇa-svabhāva-vido munayo mala-duḥkha-moha-rūpa-rajas-tamaḥ-phala-lakṣaṇān nirgataṃ sukham ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:488: rajaso rājasasya karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ duḥkhaṃ kāryasya kāraṇānurūpyād duḥkha-pracuraṃ kiñcit sukham ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:489: tamas tāmasasya karmaṇo hiṃsādeḥ phalam ajñāna-caitanya-prāyaṃ duḥkham evety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:490: tatra rajas-tamah-śabdābhyāṃ rājasa-tāmasa-karmaṇī lakṣye gobhiḥ prīṇita-matsaram ity atra yathā go-śabdena go-payo lakṣyate /
GE07bhg4c14u:491: sāttvikādi-karmaṇāṃ lakṣaṇāny aṣṭādaśe vakṣyante niyataṃ saṅga-rahitam ity ādibhiḥ //16//
GE07bhg4c14u:493: sattvāt saṃjāyate jñānaṃ rajaso lobha eva ca /
GE07bhg4c14u:495: śrīdharaḥ : tatraiva hetum āha sattvād iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:497: ataḥ sāttvikasya karmaṇaḥ prakāśa-bahulaṃ sukhaṃ phalaṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c14u:499: tasya ca duḥkha-hetutvāt tat-pūrvakasya karmaṇo duḥkhaṃ phalaṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c14u:501: tatas tāmasasya karmaṇo 'jñāna-prāpakaṃ phalaṃ bhavatīti yuktam evety arthaḥ //17//
GE07bhg4c14u:503: etādṛśa-phala-vaicitrye pūrvoktam eva hetum āha sattvād iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:505: atas tad-anurūpaṃ sāttvikasya karmaṇaḥ prakāśa-bahulaṃ sukhaṃ phalaṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c14u:506: rajaso lobho viṣaya-koṭi-prāptyāpi nivartayitum aśakyo 'bhilāṣa-viśeṣo jāyate /
GE07bhg4c14u:507: tasya ca nirantaram upacīyamānasya pūrayitum aśakyasya sarvadā duḥkha-hetutvāt tat-pūrvakasya rājasasya karmaṇo duḥkhaṃ phalaṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c14u:508: evaṃ pramāda-mohau tamasaḥ sakāśād bhavato jāyete /
GE07bhg4c14u:511: atas tāmasasya karmaṇas tāmasam ajñānādi-prāyam eva phalaṃ bhavatīti yuktam evety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:513: pramādo mohaś cāprakāśo 'pravṛttiś cety atra vyākhyātau //17//
GE07bhg4c14u:515: baladevaḥ : īdṛk-phala-vaicitrye prāg uktam eva hetum āha sattvād iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:517: ataḥ sāttvikasya karmaṇaḥ prakāśa-pracuraṃ sukhaṃ phalam /
GE07bhg4c14u:518: rajaso lobhas tṛṣṇā-viśeṣo yo viṣayakoṭibhir apy abhisevitair duṣpūras tasya ca duḥkha-hetutvāt tat-pūrvakasya karmaṇo duḥkha-pracuraṃ kiñcit sukhaṃ phalam /
GE07bhg4c14u:519: tamasas tu pramādādīni bhavanty atas tat-pūrvakasya karmaṇo 'caitanya-pracuraṃ duḥkham eva phalam //17//
GE07bhg4c14u:521: ūrdhvaṃ gacchanti sattvasthā madhye tiṣṭhanti rājasāḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:523: śrīdharaḥ : idānīṃ sattvādi-vṛtti-śīlānāṃ phala-bhedam āha ūrdhvam iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:525: ūrdhvaṃ gacchanti sattvotkarṣa-tāratamyād uttarottaraṇataguṇānandān manuṣya-gandharva-pitṛdevādi-lokān satya-loka-paryantān prāpnuvantīty arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:533: idānīṃ sattvādi-vṛtta-sthānāṃ prāg-uktam eva phalam ūrdhva-madhyādho-bhāvenāha ūrdhvam iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:534: atra tṛtīye guṇe vṛtta-śabda-yogād ādyayor api vṛttam eva vivakṣitam /
GE07bhg4c14u:535: tena sattvasthāḥ sattva-vṛtte śāstrīye jñāne karmaṇi ca niratā ūrdhvaṃ satya-loka-paryantaṃ deva-lokaṃ gacchanti te deveṣūtpadyante jñāna-karma-tāratamyena
GE07bhg4c14u:536: tathā madhye manuṣya-loke puṇya-pāpa-miśre tiṣṭhanti na tūrdhvaṃ gacchanty adho vā manuṣyeṣūtpadyante rājasā rajo-guṇa-vṛtte lobhādi-pūrvake rājase karmaṇi niratāḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:537: jaghanya-guṇa-vṛttasthā jaghanyasya guṇa-dvayāpekṣayā paścād-bhāvino nikṛṣṭasya tamaso guṇasya vṛtte nidrālasyādau sthitā adho gacchanti paścādiṣūtpadyante
GE07bhg4c14u:538: kadācij jaghanya-guṇa-vṛtta-sthāḥ sāttvikā rājasāś ca bhavanty ata āha tāmasāḥ sarvadā
GE07bhg4c14u:540: itareṣāṃ kadācit tad-vṛtta-sthatve 'pi na tat-pradhānateti bhāvaḥ //18//
GE07bhg4c14u:544: jaghanyaś cāsau guṇaś ceti tasya vṛttiḥ pramādālasyādis tatra sthitā adho gacchanti narakaṃ yānti //18//
GE07bhg4c14u:545: baladevaḥ : atha sattvādi-vṛtti-niṣṭhānāṃ tāny eva phalāny ūrdhva-madhyādho-bhāvenāha ūrdhvam iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:546: tamasi vṛtti-śabdād itarayoś ca vṛttir vivakṣitā /
GE07bhg4c14u:548: rājasā rajo-vṛtti-niṣṭhā madhye puṇya-pāpa-miśrite manuṣya-loke tiṣṭhanti /
GE07bhg4c14u:550: jaghanyaḥ sattva-rajo 'pekṣayā nikṛṣṭo yo guṇas tamaḥ-saṃjñas tad-vṛttau pramādādau sthitās tv adho gacchanti tamas-tāratamyena paśu-pakṣi-sthāvarādi-yoniṃ labhante /
GE07bhg4c14u:551: tāmasā ity uktis teṣāṃ sarvadā tamasi sthitiṃ vyanakti //18//
GE07bhg4c14u:554: guṇebhyaś ca paraṃ vetti mad-bhāvaṃ so 'dhigacchati //19//
GE07bhg4c14u:555: śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ prakṛti-guṇa-saṅga-kṛtaṃ saṃsāra-prapañcam uktvā idānīṃ tad-vivekato mokṣaṃ darśayati nānyam iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:556: yadā tu draṣṭā vivekī bhūtvā buddhyādyākāra-pariṇatebhyo guṇebhyo 'nyaṃ kartāraṃ nānupaśyati /
GE07bhg4c14u:557: api tu guṇa eva karmāṇi kurvantīti paśyati /
GE07bhg4c14u:558: guṇebhyaś ca paraṃ vyatiriktaṃ tat-sākṣiṇam ātmānaṃ vetti /
GE07bhg4c14u:559: sa tu mad-bhāvaṃ brahmatvam adhigacchati prāpnoti //19//
GE07bhg4c14u:562: tatra kṣetra-kṣetrajña-saṃyogasyeśvarādhīnatvaṃ ke vā guṇāḥ kathaṃ vā te badhnantīty artha-dvayam uktam /
GE07bhg4c14u:563: adhunā tu guṇebhyaḥ kathaṃ mokṣaṇaṃ muktasya ca kiṃ lakṣaṇam iti vaktavyam avaśiṣyate /
GE07bhg4c14u:564: tatra mithyā-jñānātmakatvād guṇānāṃ samyag-jñānāt tebhyo mokṣaṇam ity āha nānyam iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:565: guṇebhyaḥ kārya-kāraṇa-viṣayākāra-pariṇatebhyo 'nyaṃ kartāraṃ yadā draṣṭā vicāra-kuśalaḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:566: sann anupaśyati vicāram anu na paśyati guṇā evāntaḥ-karaṇa-bahiṣkaraṇa-śarīra-viṣaya-bhāvāpannāḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:568: guṇebhyaś ca tat-tad-avasthā-viśeṣeṇa pariṇatebhyaḥ paraṃ guṇa-tat-kāryāsaṃspṛṣṭaṃ tad-bhāsakam ādityam iva jala-tat-kampādy-asaṃspṛṣṭaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:569: nirvikāraṃ sarva-sākṣiṇaṃ sarvatra samaṃ kṣetrajñam ekaṃ vetti /
GE07bhg4c14u:572: guṇa-kṛtaṃ saṃsāraṃ darśayitvā guṇātītaṃ mokṣaṃ darśayati nānyam iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c14u:573: guṇebhyaḥ kartṛ-karaṇ-viṣayākāreṇa pariṇatebhyo 'nyaṃ kartāraṃ draṣṭā jīvo yadā nānupaśyati,
GE07bhg4c14u:574: kintu guṇā eva sadaiva kartāra ity evam anupaśyati anubhavatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:575: guṇebhyaḥ paraṃ vyatirikam evātmānaṃ vetti tadā sa draṣṭā mad-bhāvaṃ mayi sāyujyam adhigacchati prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c14u:576: tatra tādṛśa-jñānānantaram api mayi parāṃ bhaktiṃ kṛtvaiva ity upānta-ślokārtha-dṛṣṭyā jñeyam //19//
GE07bhg4c14u:577: baladevaḥ : evaṃ guṇa-vivekāt saṃsāram uktvā tad-vivekān mokṣam āha nānyam iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c14u:578: draṣṭā tattva-yāthātmya-darśī jīvo yadā dehendriyātmanā pariṇatebhyo guṇebhyo 'nyaṃ kartāraṃ nānupaśyati guṇān kartĪn paśyaty ātmānaṃ guṇebhyaḥ parama-kartāraṃ vetti /
GE07bhg4c14u:580: ayam āśayaḥ -- na khalu vijñānānando viśuddho jīvo yuddha-yajñādi-duḥkhamaya-karmaṇāṃ kartā,
GE07bhg4c14u:581: kintu guṇamaya-dehendriyavān eva saṃstatheti guṇa-hetukatvād guṇa-niṣṭhaṃ tat-karma-kartṛtvaṃ na tu viśuddhātma-niṣṭham iti yadānupaśyati,
GE07bhg4c14u:588: guṇān etān atītya trīn dehī deha-samudbhavān /
GE07bhg4c14u:590: śrīdharaḥ : tataś ca guṇa-kṛta-sarvānartha-nivṛttyā kṛtārtho bhavatīty āha guṇān iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:591: dehādyākāraḥ samudbhavaḥ pariṇāmo yeṣāṃ te deha-samudbhavāḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:592: tān etāṃ trīn api guṇān atītyātikramya tat-kṛtair janmādibhir vimuktaḥ sann amṛtam aśnute paramānandaṃ prāpnoti //20//
GE07bhg4c14u:595: guṇān etān māyātmakās trīn sattva-rajas-tamo-nāmno deha-samudbhavān dehotpatti-bīja-bhūtān
GE07bhg4c14u:596: atītya jīvann eva tattva-jñānena bādhitvā janma-mṛtyu-jarā-duḥkhair janmanā mṛtyunā
GE07bhg4c14u:597: jarayā duḥkhaiś cādhyātmikādibhir māyā-mayair vimukto jīvann eva tat-sambandha-śūnyaḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:598: san vidvān amṛtaṃ mokṣam aśnute prāpnoti //20 //
GE07bhg4c14u:600: tataś ca so 'pi guṇātīta evocyata ity āha guṇān iti //20//
GE07bhg4c14u:601: baladevaḥ : mad-bhāva-padenoktam arthaṃ sphuṭayati guṇān iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:602: dehī deha-madhya-stho 'pi jīvo guṇa-puruṣa-viveka-balenaitān deha-samudbhavān dehotpādaāṃs trīn guṇān atītyollaṅghya janmādibhir vimukto 'mṛtam ātmānam aśnute 'nubhavati /
GE07bhg4c14u:604: evaṃ vakṣyati brahma-bhūtaḥ prasannātmā ity ādi //20//
GE07bhg4c14u:606: kair liṅgais trīn guṇān etān atīto bhavati prabho /
GE07bhg4c14u:607: kim-ācāraḥ kathaṃ caitāṃs trīn guṇān ativartate //21//
GE07bhg4c14u:608: śrīdharaḥ : guṇān etān atītyāmṛtam aśnuta ity etat śrutvā guṇātītasya lakṣaṇam ācāraṃ guṇātyayopāyaṃ ca samyag bubhutsur arjuna uvāca kair iti
GE07bhg4c14u:609: he prabho kair liṅgaiḥ kīdṛśair ātma-vyutpannaiś cihnair guṇātīto dehī bhavatīti lakṣaṇa-praśnaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:612: kathaṃ ca kenopāyena etāṃs trīn api guṇān atītya vartate /
GE07bhg4c14u:615: guṇān etān atītya jīvann evāmṛtam aśnuta ity etac chrutvā guṇātītasya lakṣaṇam cācāraṃ ca guṇātyayopāyaṃ ca samyag bubhutsur arjuna uvāca kair iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:616: etān guṇān atīto yaḥ sa kair liṅgair viśiṣṭo bhavati /
GE07bhg4c14u:617: yair liṅgaiḥ sa jñātuṃ śakyas tāni me brūhīty ekaḥ praśnaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:618: prabhutvād bhṛtya-duḥkhaṃ bhagavataiva nivāraṇīyam iti sūcayan sambodhayati prabho iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:620: kiṃ yatheṣṭa-ceṣṭaḥ kiṃ vā niyantrita iti dvitīyaḥ praśnaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:621: kathaṃ vā kena ca prakāreṇaitāṃs trīn guṇān ativartate 'tikrāmatīti guṇātītatvopāyaḥ ka iti tṛtīyaḥ praśnaḥ //21//
GE07bhg4c14u:623: sthita-prajñasya kā bhāṣā ity ādinā dvitīyādhyāye pṛṣṭam apy arthaṃ punas tato 'pi viśeṣa-bubhūtsayā pṛcchati kair liṅgaiḥ ity ekaḥ praśnaḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:624: kaiś cihnais triguṇātītaḥ sa jñeya ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:628: sthita-prajñasya kā bhāṣā ity ādau sthita-prajño guṇātītaḥ kathaṃ syād iti tadānīṃ na pṛṣṭam idānīṃ tu pṛṣṭam iti viśeṣaḥ //21//
GE07bhg4c14u:629: baladevaḥ : guṇātītasya lakṣaṇam ācāraṃ ca guṇātyaya-sādhanaṃ cārjunaḥ pṛcchati kair ity ardhakena /
GE07bhg4c14u:630: prathamaḥ praśnaḥ kaiś cihnair guṇātīto jñātuṃ śakya ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:631: kim ācāra iti dvitīyaḥ sa kiṃ yatheṣṭācāro niyatācāro vety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:632: kathaṃ caitān iti tṛtīyaḥ kena sādhanena guṇān atyetīty arthaḥ //21//
GE07bhg4c14u:634: prakāśaṃ ca pravṛttiṃ ca moham eva ca pāṇḍava /
GE07bhg4c14u:635: na dveṣṭi saṃpravṛttāni na nivṛttāni kāṅkṣati //22//
GE07bhg4c14u:636: śrīdharaḥ : sthita-prajñasya kā bhāṣā [Gītā 2.54] ity ādinā dvitīye 'dhyāye pṛṣṭam
GE07bhg4c14u:637: api dattottaram api punar viśeṣa-bubhūtsayā pṛcchatīti jñātvā prakārāntareṇa tasya
GE07bhg4c14u:638: lakṣaṇādikaṃ śrī-bhagavān uvāca prakāśaṃ cety ādi ṣaḍbhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:640: prakāśaṃ ca sarva-dvāreṣu dehe 'sminn iti pūrvoktaṃ sattva-kāryam /
GE07bhg4c14u:644: sarvāṇy api yathāyathaṃ sampravṛttāni svataḥ-prāptāni santi duḥkha-buddhyā yo na dveṣṭi /
GE07bhg4c14u:645: nivṛttāni ca santi sukha-buddhyā yo na kāṅkṣati,
GE07bhg4c14u:648: sthita-prajñasya kā bhāṣā [Gītā 2.54] ity ādinā pṛṣṭam api prajahāti yadā kāmān [Gītā
GE07bhg4c14u:649: 2.55] ity ādinā dattottaram api punaḥ prakārāntareṇa bubhūtsamānaḥ pṛcchatīty avadhāya
GE07bhg4c14u:650: prakārāntareṇa tasya lakṣaṇādikaṃ śrī-bhagavān uvāca prakāśaṃ cety ādi pañcabhiḥ ślokaiḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:651: yas tāvat kair liṅgair yukto guṇātīto bhavatīti praśnas tasyottaraṃ śṛṇu /
GE07bhg4c14u:656: sarvāṇy api guṇa-kāryāṇi yathāyathaṃ sampravṛttāni sva-sāmagrī-vaśād udbhūtāni santi duḥkha-rūpāṇy api duḥkha-buddhyā yo na dveṣṭi /
GE07bhg4c14u:657: tathā vināśa-sāmagrī-vaśān nivṛttāni tāni sukha-rūpāṇy api santi sukha-buddhyā yo na kāṅkṣati na kāmayate svapnavan mithyātva-niścayāt
GE07bhg4c14u:658: / etādṛśa-dveṣa-rāga-śūnyo yaḥ sa guṇātīta ucyata iti caturtha-śloka-gatenānvayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:659: idaṃ ca svātma-pratyakṣaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ svārtham eva na parārtham /
GE07bhg4c14u:660: na hi svāśritau dveṣa-tad-abhāvau rāga-tad-abhāvau ca paraḥ pratyetum arhati //22//
GE07bhg4c14u:662: tatra kair liṅgair guṇātīto bhavatīti prathama-praśnasyottaram āha prakāśaṃ ca sarva-dvāreṣu dehe 'smin prakāśa upajāyate iti sattva-kāryam
GE07bhg4c14u:666: sarvāṇy api yathāyathaṃ sampravṛttāni svataḥ-prāptāni duḥkha-buddhyā yo na dveṣṭi /
GE07bhg4c14u:667: guṇa-kāryāṇy etāni nivṛttāni ca sukha-buddhyā yo na kāṅkṣati,
GE07bhg4c14u:670: baladevaḥ : yadyapi sthita-prajñasya kā bhāṣā ity ādinā pṛṣṭam idaṃ prajahāti yadā kāmān ity ādinottaritaṃ ca,
GE07bhg4c14u:671: tathāpi viśeṣa-jijñāsayā pṛcchatīti vidhāntareṇa tasya lakṣāṇādīny āha bhagavān prakāśaṃ cety ādi pañcabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:672: tatraikena lakṣaṇaṃ sva-saṃvedyam āha prakāśaṃ sattva-kāryaṃ pravṛttiṃ rajaḥ-kāryaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:673: mohaṃ tamaḥ-kāryaṃ etāni trīṇi sampravṛttāny utpādaka-sāmagrī-vaśāt prāptāni duḥkha-rūpāṇy
GE07bhg4c14u:675: vināśaka-sāmagrī-vaśān nivṛttāni vinaṣṭāni tāni sukha-rūpāny api sukha-buddhyā yo nākāṅkṣati,
GE07bhg4c14u:676: etādṛśa-dveṣa-rāga-śūnyo guṇātītaḥ sa ucyate iti caturthenānvayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:677: svagatau dveṣa-tad-abhāvau rāga-tad-abhāvau ca paro na veditum arhatīti sva-saṃvedyam idaṃ lakṣaṇam //22//
GE07bhg4c14u:679: udāsīnavad āsīno guṇair yo na vicālyate /
GE07bhg4c14u:680: guṇā vartanta ity eva yo 'vatiṣṭhati neṅgate //23//
GE07bhg4c14u:681: śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ sva-saṃvedyaṃ guṇātītasya lakṣaṇam uktvā para-saṃvedyaṃ tasya lakṣaṇaṃ vaktuṃ dvitīya-praśnasya kim ācāra ity asyottaram āha udāsīnavad iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:682: udāsīnavat sākṣitayāsīnaḥ sthitaḥ san guṇair guṇa-kāryaiḥ sukha-duḥkhādibhir na yo vicālyate svarūpān na pracyavate api tu guṇā eva svakāryeṣu vartante /
GE07bhg4c14u:683: etair mama sambandha eva nāstīti viveka-jñānena yas tuṣṇīm avatiṣṭhati /
GE07bhg4c14u:688: kim ācāraḥ iti dvitīya-praśnasyottaram āha udāsīnavad iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:689: guṇa-kāryaiḥ sukha-duḥkhādibhir yo na vicālyate svarūpāvasthān na cyavate,
GE07bhg4c14u:690: api tu guṇa eva sva-sva-kāryeṣu vartanta ity eveti ebhir mama sambandha eva nāstīti viveka-jñānena yas tūṣṇīm avatiṣṭhati parasmaipadam ārṣam
GE07bhg4c14u:692: guṇātītaḥ sa ucyate iti guṇātītasya etāni cihnāni etān ācārāṃś ca dṛṣṭvaiva guṇātīto vaktavyo na tu guṇātītatvopapatti-vāvadūko guṇātīto vaktavya iti bhāvaḥ //23-25//
GE07bhg4c14u:693: baladevaḥ : atha para-saṃvedya-lakṣaṇaṃ vaktuṃ kim ācāraḥ iti dvitīya-praśnasyottaram āha udāsīneti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:694: udāsīno madhyastho yathā vivādinoḥ pakṣagrahaiḥ sva-mādhyasthyān na vicālyate,
GE07bhg4c14u:695: tayā sukha-duḥkhādi-bhāvena parṇatair guṇair yo nātmāvasthitair vicālyate,
GE07bhg4c14u:697: mama tair na sambandha iti niścitya tūṣṇīm avatiṣṭhate /
GE07bhg4c14u:709: tulyo nindā cātmanaḥ saṃstutiś ca yasya //24//
GE07bhg4c14u:711: same duḥkha-sukhe dveṣa-rāga-śūnyatayānātma-dharmatayānṛtatayā ca yasya sa sama-duḥkha-sukhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:712: kasmād evaṃ yasmāt svasthaḥ svasminn ātmany eva sthito dvaita-darśana-śūnyatvāt /
GE07bhg4c14u:713: ata eva samāni heyopādeya-bhāva-rahitāni loṣṭāśma-kāñcanāni yasya sa tathā /
GE07bhg4c14u:715: ata eva tulye priyāpriye sukha-duḥkha-sādhane yasya hita-sādhanatva-buddhi-viṣayatvābhāvenopekṣaṇīyatvāt /
GE07bhg4c14u:718: nindātma-saṃstutī doṣa-kīrtana-guṇa-kīrtane yasya sa guṇātīta ucyata iti dvitīya-gatenānvayaḥ //24//
GE07bhg4c14u:721: yato 'yaṃ svasthaḥ svarūpa-niṣṭho 'taeva sama-duḥkha-sukhaḥṅ same anātma-dharmatvāt tulye sukha-duḥkhe yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:722: samāny anupādeyatayā tulyāni losṭrādīni yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:723: loṣṭra-mṛt-piṇḍa-tulye priyāpriye sukha-duḥkha-sādhane vastunī yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:727: ya īdṛśo guṇatītaḥ sa ucyata iti dvitīyenānvayaḥ //24//
GE07bhg4c14u:734: sarvān dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthān ārambhān udyamān parityaktuṃ śīlaṃ yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:740: nindā-stutī śabda-rūpe mānāpamānau tu śabdam antareṇāpi kāya-mano-vyāpāra-viśeṣāv iti bhedaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:741: atra pa-kāra-va-kārayoḥ pāṭha-vikalpe 'py arthaḥ sa eva /
GE07bhg4c14u:743: mitra-pakṣasyevāri-pakṣasyāpi dveṣāviṣayaḥ svayaṃ tayor anugraha-nigraha-śūnya iti vā /
GE07bhg4c14u:745: ārabhyanta ity ārambhāḥ karmāṇi tān sarvān parityaktuṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa tathā /
GE07bhg4c14u:747: udāsīnavad āsīna ity ādy-ukta-prakārācāro guṇātītaḥ sa ucyate /
GE07bhg4c14u:748: yad uktam upekṣakatvādi tad-vidyodayāt pūrvaṃ yatna-sādhyaṃ vidyādhikāriṇā sādhanatvenānuṣṭheyam utpannāyāṃ tu
GE07bhg4c14u:749: vidyāyāṃ jīvan-muktasya guṇātītasyoktaṃ dharma-jātam ayatna-siddhaṃ lakṣaṇatvena tiṣṭhaty arthaḥ //25//
GE07bhg4c14u:753: mānāpamānau tu kāyamanovyāpāreṇāpi syātām iti bhedaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:755: ya īdṛśo guṇātītaḥ undāsīnavat ity ādy uktā yasyācārḥ parair api saṃvedyāḥ sa guṇātīto bodhyo na tu tad-upapatti-vāvadūka iti bhāvaḥ //25//
GE07bhg4c14u:759: śrīdharaḥ : kathaṃ caitān trīn guṇān ativartate iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:762: mām eva parameśvaram avyabhicāreṇa ekāntena bhakti-yogena yaḥ sevate sa etān guṇān samatītya samyag atikramya brahma-bhūyāya brahma-bhāvāya mokṣāya kalpate samartho bhavati //26//
GE07bhg4c14u:764: adhunā katham etān guṇān ativartata iti tṛtīya-praśnasya prativacanam āha māṃ ceti /
GE07bhg4c14u:766: mām eveśvaraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ sarva-bhūtāntaryāmiṇaṃ māyayā kṣetrajñatām āgataṃ paramānanda-ghanaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:767: bhagavantaṃ vāsudevam avyabhicāreṇa parama-prema-lakṣaṇena bhakti-yogena dvādaśādhyāyoktena
GE07bhg4c14u:768: yaḥ sevate sadā cintayati sa mad-bhakta etān prāg-uktān guṇān samatītya samyag-atikramyādvaita-darśanena
GE07bhg4c14u:769: bādhitvā brahma-bhūyāya brahma-bhavanāya mokṣāya kalpate samartho bhavati /
GE07bhg4c14u:770: sarvadā bhagavac-cintanam eva guṇātītatvopāya ity arthaḥ //26//
GE07bhg4c14u:772: kathaṃ caitān trīn guṇān ativartate iti tṛtīyapraśnasyottaram āha māṃ ceti /
GE07bhg4c14u:774: mām eva śyāmasundarākāraṃ parameśvaraṃ bhakti-yogena yaḥ sevate sa eva brahma-bhūyāya
GE07bhg4c14u:775: brahmatvāya brahmānubhavāya yāvat bhaktyāham ekayā grāhyaḥ iti mad-vākye ekayeti
GE07bhg4c14u:776: viśeṣaṇopanyāsāt mām eva ye prapadyante māyām etāṃ taranti te ity atrāpi eva-kāra-prayogāt
GE07bhg4c14u:777: bhaktyā vinā prakārāntareṇa brahmānubhavo na bhavatīti niścayāt /
GE07bhg4c14u:780: jñānaṃ ca mayi sannyaset iti jñānināṃ carama-daśāyāṃ jñānasyāpi nyāsa-śravaṇāt /
GE07bhg4c14u:781: bhakti-yogasya tu kvāpi nyāsāśravaṇāt bhakti-yoga eva so 'vyabhicāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:782: tena karma-yogam iva jñāna-yogam api parityājya yady avyabhicāreṇa kevalenaiva
GE07bhg4c14u:784: tarhi jñānī api guṇātīto bhavati, nānyathā /
GE07bhg4c14u:785: ananya-bhaktas tu nirguṇo mad-apāśrayaḥ ity ekādaśokter guṇātīto bhavaty eva /
GE07bhg4c14u:786: atra idaṃ tattvaṃ VEṛṣE ity atrāsaṅginaḥ karmiṇo jñānino vā sāttvikatvenaiva sādhakatvāvagates tat-sāhacaryāt nirguṇo mad-apāśrayaḥ iti bhaktaḥ sādhaka evāvagamyate /
GE07bhg4c14u:787: tataś ca jñānī jñāna-siddhaḥ sann eva sāttvikatvaṃ parityajya guṇātīto bhavati /
GE07bhg4c14u:788: bhaktas tu sādhaka-daśām ārabhyaiva guṇātīto bhavatīty artho labhyate /
GE07bhg4c14u:790: mām eveśvaraṃ nārāyaṇam avyabhicāreṇa bhakti-yogena dvādaśādyāyoktena yaḥ sevata iti madhusūdana-sarasvatī-pādāś ca vyācakṣate //26//
GE07bhg4c14u:791: baladevaḥ : kathaṃ caitāṃs trīn guṇān ativartata iti tṛtīya-praśnasyottaram āha māṃ ceti /
GE07bhg4c14u:793: nānyaṃ guṇebhyaḥ karāram ity ādy-uktyā yo guṇa-puruṣa-viveka-khyātim avāpa tayaiva tasyā guṇātyayo na saṃsidhyati,
GE07bhg4c14u:794: kintu tadvān api yo māṃ kṛṣṇam eva māyā-guṇāspṛṣṭaṃ māyā-niyantāraṃ nāyāyaṇādi-rūpeṇa
GE07bhg4c14u:796: bhakti-yogena sevate śrayati sa etān duratyayān api guṇān atītyākramya brahma-bhūyāya
GE07bhg4c14u:800: tathā ca bhakti-śiraskayaiva tad-viveka-khyātyā jīvasya svarūpa-lābho,
GE07bhg4c14u:802: yat tu brahma-bhūyāya ity anena mad-rūpatāṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:804: tan-niravadhānam eva tenaivedaṃ jñānam ity ādinā mokṣe 'pi /
GE07bhg4c14u:805: svarūpa-bhedasyābhihitatvāt nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyam upaiti ity ādi śrutiṣv api
GE07bhg4c14u:806: tatra tasya dṛṣṭatvād aṇutva-vibhutvādi-nitya-dharma-kṛtatvena nityatvāc ca tad-bhedasya
GE07bhg4c14u:807: tasmād guṇāṣṭaka-viśiṣṭatvam eva brahaiva san brahmāpy eti iti śrutyau tu brahma-sadṛśaḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:810: vavā yathā tathaivevaṃ sāmye ity amara-koṣāc ca /
GE07bhg4c14u:815: śrīdharaḥ : tatra hetum āha brahmaṇo hīti /
GE07bhg4c14u:818: yathā ghanībhūtaḥ prakāśa eva sūrya-maṇḍalaṃ tadvad ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:821: tathā tat-sādhanasya śāśvatasya dharmasya ca śiddja-sattvātmakatvāt /
GE07bhg4c14u:824: ato mat-sevino mad-bhāvasyāvaśyambhāvitvād yuktam evoktaṃ brahma-bhūyāya kalpata iti //
GE07bhg4c14u:826: sukhaṃ tarati mad-bhakta ity abhāṣi caturdaśe //
GE07bhg4c14u:834: ahaṃ nivikalpako vāsudevaḥ pratitiṣṭhaty atreti pratiṣṭhā kalpita-rūpa-rahitam akalpitaṃ rūpam /
GE07bhg4c14u:835: ato yo mām upādhikaṃ brahma sevate sa brahma-bhūyāya kalpata iti yuktam eva /
GE07bhg4c14u:836: kīdṛśasya brahmaṇaḥ pratiṣṭhāham ity ākāṅkṣāyāṃ viśeṣaṇāni amṛtasya vināśa-rahitasya,
GE07bhg4c14u:841: sukhasya viṣayendriya-saṃyogajatvaṃ vārayati aikāntikasyāvyabhicāriṇaḥ sarvasmin deśe kāle ca vidyamānasyaikāntika-sukha-rūpasyety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:842: etādṛśasya brahmaṇo yasmād ahaṃ vāstavaṃ svarūpaṃ tasmān mad-bhaktaḥ saṃsārān mucyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:843: tathā coktaṃ brahmaṇā bhagavantaṃ śrī-kṛṣṇaṃ prati -
GE07bhg4c14u:848: atra sarvopādhi-śūnya ātmā brahma tvam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:850: sarveṣām api vastūnāṃ bhāvārtho bhavati sthitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:851: tasyāpi bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ kim atad vastu rūpyatām // [BhP 10.14.57] iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:852: sarveṣām eva kārya-vastūnāṃ bhāvārthaḥ sattā-rūpaḥ paramārtho bhavati kāryākāreṇa jāyamāne sopādhike brahmaṇi sthitaḥ kāraṇa-sattātiriktāyāḥ kārya-sattāyā anabhyupagamāt /
GE07bhg4c14u:853: tasyāpi bhavataḥ kāraṇasya sopādhikasya brahmaṇo bhāvārthaḥ sattā-rūpo 'rtho bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ sopādhikasya nirupādhike kalpitatvāt kalpitasya cādhiṣṭhānān atirekāt,
GE07bhg4c14u:855: ataḥ kim atad-vastu tasmāc chrī-kṛṣṇād anyad vastu paramārthikaṃ kiṃ nirūpyatāṃ tad evaikaṃ paramārthikaṃ nānyat kim apīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:856: tad etad ihāpy uktaṃ brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāham iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:857: athavā tvad-bhaktas tvad-bhāvam āpnotu nāma kathaṃ nu brahma-bhāvāya kalpyate brahmaṇaḥ sakāśāt tavānyatvād ity āśaṅkyāha brahmaṇo hīti /
GE07bhg4c14u:858: brahmaṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ pratiṣṭhā paryāptir aham eva na tu mad-bhinnaṃ brahmety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:859: tathāmṛtasya amṛtatvasya mokṣasya cāvyayasya sarvathānucchedyasya ca ca pratiṣṭhāham eva /
GE07bhg4c14u:860: mayy eva mokṣaḥ paryavastio mat-prāptir eva mokṣa ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:861: tathā śāśvatasya nitya-mokṣa-phalasya dharmasya jñāna-niṣṭhā-lakṣaṇasya ca paryāptir aham eva /
GE07bhg4c14u:862: jñāna-niṣṭhā-lakṣaṇo dharmo mayy eva paryavasito na tena mad-bhinnaṃ kiṃcit prāpyam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:863: tathaikāntikasya sukhasya ca paryāptir aham eva parmānanda-rūpatvān na mad-bhinnaṃ kiṃcit sukhaṃ prāpyam astīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:864: tasmād yuktam evoktaṃ mad-bhakto brahma-bhūyāya kalpata iti //27//
GE07bhg4c14u:873: hi yasmāt parama-pratiṣṭhātvena prasiddhaṃ yad brahma tasyāpy ahaṃ pratiṣṭhā pratiṣṭhīyate
GE07bhg4c14u:874: 'sminn iti pratiṣṭhā āśrayo 'nna-mayādiṣu śrutiṣu sarvatraiva pratiṣṭhā-padasya tathārthatvāt /
GE07bhg4c14u:877: tathā śāśvatasya dharmasya sādhana-phala-daśayor api nitya-sthitasya bhakty-ākhyasya parama-dharmasyāhaṃ pratiṣṭhā,
GE07bhg4c14u:878: tathā tat-prāpyasyaikāntika-bhakta-sambandhinaḥ sukhasya premṇaś cāhaṃ pratiṣṭhā /
GE07bhg4c14u:879: ataḥ sarvasyāpi mad-adhīnatvāt kaivalya-kāmanayā kṛtena mad-bhajanena brahmaṇi līyamāno brahmatvam api prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c14u:880: atra brahmaṇo 'haṃ pratiṣṭhā ghanībhūtaṃ brahmaivāhaṃ yathā ghanībhūta-prakāśa eva sūrya-maṇḍalaṃ tadvad ity arthaḥ iti svāmi-caraṇāḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:881: sūryasya tejo-rūpatve 'pi yathā tejasa āśrayatvam apy ucyate /
GE07bhg4c14u:882: evaṃ me kṛṣṇasya brahma-rūpatve 'pi brahmaṇaḥ pratiṣṭhātvam api /
GE07bhg4c14u:883: atra śrī-viṣṇu-purāṇam api pramāṇam -- śubhāśrayaḥ sa cittasya sarvagasya tathātmanaḥ [ViP 6.7.76] iti vyākhyātaṃ ca tatrāpi svāmi-caraṇaiḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:885: tad uktaṃ bhagavatā brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāham iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:887: prakṛtau puruṣe caiva brahmaṇy api sa prabhuḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:888: yathaika eva puruṣo vāsudevo vyavasthitaḥ // iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:892: tathā hari-vaṃśe 'pi vipra-kumārānayana-prasaṅge arjunaṃ prati śrī-bhagavad-vākyaṃ --
GE07bhg4c14u:893: tat-paraṃ paramaṃ brahma sarvaṃ vibhajate jagat /
GE07bhg4c14u:894: mamaiva tad ghanaṃ tejo jñātum arhasi bhārata // (HV 2.114.11-12)
GE07bhg4c14u:899: govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi // iti /
GE07bhg4c14u:902: vetsyasy anugṛhītaṃ me sampraśnair vivṛtaṃ hṛdi //
GE07bhg4c14u:904: madhusūdana-sarasvatī-pādāś ca vyācakṣate sma yathā -- nanu tvad-bhaktas tvad-bhāvam
GE07bhg4c14u:905: āpnotu nāma kathaṃ brahma-bhūyāya kalpate brahmaṇaḥ sakāśāt tavānyatvād ity āśaṅkyāha brahmaṇo hīti /
GE07bhg4c14u:914: tac ca bhaktyaiva bhavatīty adhyāyārtho nirūpitaḥ //
GE07bhg4c14u:917: baladevaḥ : nanu tad-viveka-khyātyā tvad-eka-bhaktyā ca guṇātīto labdha-svarūpo brahma-śabdito muktaḥ kathaṃ tiṣṭhed iti cet tatrāha brahmaṇo hīti /
GE07bhg4c14u:920: mṛitir nirgatasyāvyayasya tādrūpyaṇaikarasasya muktasya mad-atipriyasyāham eva vijñānānanda-mūrtir
GE07bhg4c14u:922: pratiṣṭhā pratiṣṭhīyate 'tra iti nirukteḥ paramāśrayo 'tipriyo bhavāmīti tādṛśaṃ māṃ parayā bhaktyānubhavaṃs tiṣṭhatīti /
GE07bhg4c14u:923: na matto viśleṣa-leśo na ca punar āvartate,
GE07bhg4c14u:924: yad gatvā na nivartante muktānāṃ paramā gatiḥ iti smṛtibhyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:925: nanu muktas tvāṃ kathaṃ śrayeta śravaṇa-phalasya mukter lābhād iti ced asty atiśayitaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:926: phalam iti bhāvenāha śāśvatasya sādhāraṇasya sukhasya ca vicitra-līlā-rasasyāham eva pratiṣṭheti /
GE07bhg4c14u:927: tīvrānanda-rūpa-tad-vibhūti-mal-līlānubhavāya mām eva samāśrayatīty evam āha śrutiḥ raso vai saḥ,
GE07bhg4c14u:928: rasaṃ hy evāyaṃ labdhvānandī bhavati [TaittU 2.7.1] iti //27//
GE07bhg4c14u:929: saṃsāro guṇa-yogaḥ syād vimokṣas tu guṇātyayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c14u:932: [*ENDNOTE] The eight qualities are listed in the ChAndogya UpaniSad:
GE07bhg4c14u:933: AtmApahata-pApmA vijaro vimRtyur vizoko vijighatso 'pipAsaH satya-kAmaH satya-saGkalpaH so 'nveSTavyaH /
